name: Fireball
description: Deal 3 damage to an enemy in range. Spend up to 2 additional Red Gems to deal +2 damage each.
flavor_text: A blazing sphere of fire that engulfs its target.

name: Lightning Storm
description: Deal 4 damage to all enemies on target hex. Spend up to 3 additional Blue Gems to deal +1 damage each.
flavor_text: Crackling bolts of lightning rain down upon the battlefield.

name: Resource Converter
description: Convert 1 Cursed Crystal into 1 Shadow Fragment.
flavor_text: Harness the chaotic energy of cursed crystals.
